scene_description_enriched: A male figure, identified as Saint Christopher by his halo and the presence of a lion, sits on a grassy hill. He wears a blue tunic, yellow cloak, and dark leggings. He holds a staff with a ribbon and a sword. To his right, a lion sits attentively. To his left, a broken hammer lies on the ground. The background depicts a rolling landscape with trees and a distant blue sky.
